name: Frenzy!
description:
made for ScoreSpace Jam #6

this is a Super chaotic platform bullet-hell based on KARMA. The game is propositally very difficult, sooo practice is recommended if you want to get a high Score.

but i assure you that its possible to get a high score, my personal best right now is 9900, and i survived more than 5 minutes so it's 100% possible if you have a bit of practice

good Luck :)
